title: Tranquil Healing Center: Naturopathic and Midwifery care
author: Tranquil Healing Center
description: Helping Families Grow, Healthy. Mailing: PO Box 397 Physical: 131 NE Roy Boad Road Belfair, Wa 98528
cleaned_text: Naturopathic medicine is a distinct primary health care profession, emphasizing prevention, treatment, and optimal health through the use of therapeutic methods and substances that encourage individuals' inherent self-healing process. The practice of naturopathic medicine includes modern and traditional, scientific, and empirical methods. The following principles are the foundation of naturopathic medical practice: Dr. Terra is NO LONGER a prefered provider with any insurance companies. Insurance coverage varies by carrier, state, and plan, and frequently does not cover naturopathic services or out of network providers. It is the patient's responsibility to confirm coverage. Please verify your coverage with your insurance provider prior to your appointment if you plan to submit the superbill to them. We do not provide any additional assistance in billing your insurance beyond the superbill provided on the day of service. Payment is due at the time of service. If you have any questions about the billing policies at Tranquil Healing Center, please call the office. We will do our best to assist you. Payment is due at the time of service for all services rendered by Tranquil Healing Center. Labs are additional costs incurred directly with the lab- not Tranquil Healing Center. We have a 24-hour cancelation policy- This specifically means that if you do not contact the office to cancel, your appointment 24 business hours before your appointment you will be charged a fee. Our definition for business hours is, the days that the office is open to see patients.
